trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
The HtmlSelectBuilder control interacts with the page parser to build an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
Use the HtmlSelectBuilder control to customize the parsing of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> property is set to `false` so that white space is always ignored.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to determine the type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's child controls.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder"></xref> class.
Determines whether the white space literals in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control are to be processed or ignored.

This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to always ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.

This method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that white space in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control is ignored.
Obtains the <xref:System.Type> for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's child controls.
Use the GetChildControlType method to return the <xref:System.Type> of a specified child control in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
The tag name of the child control.
An array of attributes contained in the child control.
The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's specified child control.
